roleset.name: document, as with a chart
roleset.note: CHART-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls transcribe-25.4. (from chart.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yet, [the unassuming Mr. Corry]-3 helped *trace*-3 chart USX's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil.
example.arg: USX's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil

example.name: ergative
example.text: Their song "Love is a Beautiful Thing" charted into the Top 20 in May 2007
example.arg: Their song "Love is a Beautiful Thing"

roleset.name: document, as with a chart
roleset.note: CHART_OUT-V NOTES: Updated by Julia. See VNcls transcribe-25.4. (from chart.02-v)

example.name: exactly the same as previous ex
example.text: Yet, [the unassuming Mr. Corry]-1 helped *trace*-1 chart out USX's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil.
example.arg: USX's transition from Big Steel to Big Oil
